header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

CORPORATE CULTURE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.5.7″ width=”70%” width_tablet=”90%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”58px||58px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are successfully winning all the hurdles faced in achieving our goals, while taking consistent initiatives, in filling the gap between the most high-grade quality products, along with eco-friendly manufacturing. All our executives and associates are very keen and enthusiastic about our values and practice them continually.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_5_font=”Lato|900|||||||” header_5_text_color=”#004b4f” header_5_font_size=”30px” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Values

With Health being our top priority at GMCI, we are endeavouring towards zero accidents and incidents worldwide. We follow World-Class Manufacturing norms for the safety of our highly skilled workers and employees. The sustainability of GMCI focuses on our consistent devotion to our core values.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#004b4f” open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#e02b20″ _builder_version=”4.5.7″ toggle_text_color=”#004b4f” toggle_font=”Lato|900||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”30px” body_font=”Lato|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#004B4F” body_font_size=”19px” body_letter_spacing=”0.5px” body_line_height=”1.8em” width=”86%” width_tablet=”90%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” body_text_color_tablet=”” body_text_color_phone=”” body_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”19px” body_font_size_phone=”17px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_toggle=”margin-bottom: 0 !important;” border_width_all=”0px” border_width_top=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}” body_orientation_tablet=”center” body_orientation_phone=”center” body_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Dignity” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_css_main_element=”display:none;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An organization’s honour originates by their prominent employees. All ideas and opinions are encouraged, irrespective to their experience, organizational class or status.

We appreciate the dedication and hard work of our employees that have made GMCI, such a prestigious corporation.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Dignity” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

An organization’s honour originates by their prominent employees. All ideas and opinions are encouraged, irrespective to their experience, organizational class or status.

We appreciate the dedication and hard work of our employees that have made GMCI, such a prestigious corporation.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Control” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

The daily set of operations that our employees undertake, together with their determination to achieve it, is our pathway to fortune. Our workforce has crystal clear, self-defined activities, which has proven to be a significant element for our success.

GMCI is a corporation charged with self-driven and self-accomplishing professionals with its self-evident track-record.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Credibility” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Our trustworthiness and ingenuity have established our credibility within our clientele. We practice a powerful communicable workflow and an efficient time management system to completing our responsibilities, with proficiency.

GMCI’s values and ethics symbolizes our authenticity in the quality we deliver.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=” Leadership” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Our core competence, along with the team of highly experienced and profoundly knowledgeable professionals have played a vital role in bringing us ahead as market leaders.

We sincerely take complete ownership to all our actions and the quality of our deliverables to enhance our reputation.

 

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Ethics” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

We strictly adhere to Non-Maleficence policy, wherein we pledge, not to harm anyone or any being, intentionally. As employees of such a prestigious organization, we work with complete honesty and responsibility.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/code-green.jpg” alt=”code green” title_text=”code green” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_5_font=”Lato||||||||” header_5_text_color=”#004b4f” header_5_font_size=”30px” header_6_font=”Lato||||||||” header_6_text_color=”#0c71c3″ header_6_font_size=”19px” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Code Green

The environmental health of the earth is no hidden secret from anyone, thus being global leaders, in the industry, we consider it as our responsibility to address this condition. “Code Green” is an innovative initiative by us at GMCI, where we bring our values, our ethics and our vision to life and make sure all our employees obey these principles. It is an integral part of our pledge to manufacture our product conservatively for a sustainable future. ‘Code Green’ consists of the following core constituents.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#004b4f” open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#e02b20″ _builder_version=”4.5.7″ toggle_text_color=”#004b4f” toggle_font=”Lato|900||on|||||” toggle_font_size=”30px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Lato|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#004B4F” body_font_size=”19px” body_letter_spacing=”0.5px” body_line_height=”1.8em” width=”84%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” body_text_color_tablet=”” body_text_color_phone=”” body_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”19px” body_font_size_phone=”17px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_toggle=”margin-bottom: 0 !important;” border_width_all=”0px” border_width_top=”1px” global_colors_info=”{}” body_orientation_tablet=”center” body_orientation_phone=”center” body_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Team Player” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_css_main_element=”display:none;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We at GMCI, are a squad of team-players, we understand our course of action and prioritize our activities concerning the importance of our organization. Our team accepts positive criticism and constantly inter-communicates within, for the best results.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Go Eco-Friendly” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Sustainable manufacturing practices are a prime element, where we depreciate waste and keep our manufacturing process as efficient as possible. We have also inculcated the use of clean energy methods in our manufacturing plants to prove our seriousness.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Safety First” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Spreading awareness regarding the importance of safety during operations is very crucial. We endure smooth operations because we practice extreme caution and follow all safety measures. GMCI follows the zero-tolerance policy concerning the safety and protection of our workforce.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Workplace Aura” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

The aura of your workplace determines your attitude and your productivity at work. We, as employees, do our best to keep our work environment positive and fun-loving. We focus on our pre-determined goals, along with the exchange of ideas and opinions, has helped us attain commendable performance.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Agile Creativity” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Market volatility has surged globally, thorough research of trends and obtaining new opportunities of business has now become very important. Therefore, creativity mingled with agility is supporting GMCI to gain an upper- hand against their competitors.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Team Player” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

We at GMCI, are a squad of team-players, we understand our course of action and prioritize our activities concerning the importance of our organization. Our team accepts positive criticism and constantly inter-communicates within, for the best results.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Workplace-Diversity-@-GMCI-Limited.jpg” title_text=”Workplace Diversity @ GMCI Limited” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_margin=”||48px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_5_font=”Lato|700|||||||” header_5_text_color=”#004b4f” header_5_font_size=”30px” header_6_font=”Lato||||||||” header_6_text_color=”#0c71c3″ header_6_font_size=”19px” width=”70%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-10px||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Workplace Diversity

An open atmosphere and a diverse community means that the best expertise is on the table and that everyone’s thoughts are considered. A strong culture of diversity, like a strong culture of health, is good for industry, the workforce, and our individual career development.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_5_font=”Lato||||||||” header_5_text_color=”#004b4f” header_5_font_size=”30px” header_6_font=”Lato||||||||” header_6_text_color=”#0c71c3″ header_6_font_size=”19px” width=”70%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-10px||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We at GMCI strive to create a work environment that embraces respect and understanding and enables all of our employees to play an active role in a workplace environment that allows personal development and diversified values, which will allow new directions to arise and technological innovation to take place.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_image=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/sky-blue-texture-1-scaled.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.56)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”130px||130px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”58px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”85%” module_alignment=”center” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”38px” text_font_size_phone=”27px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Get more information and advice from our team of experts.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.gmciltd.com/contact-us/” button_text=”CONTACT US” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.14.6″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#04484E” button_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#ffffff” button_border_radius=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”23px|||30px|false|false” custom_padding=”13px|32px|13px|32px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_width__hover=”1px” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

All our executives and associates are very keen and enthusiastic about our values and practice them continually.Our Values With Health being our top priority […]
